name: insider-security-ueba
label: Insider Security UEBA
description: User and Entity Behaviour Analytics - Detect malicious user activity early in your on-premise or cloud infrastructure. This connector facilitates automated operations of fetching Malicious activity alerts and searching Data Enrichment.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the Sever URL of the Insider Security Instance.
fields.description: Specify the Sever URL of the Insider Security Instance.

fields.name: api_token
fields.title: API Token
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token that you have generated on the InsiderSecurity instance.
fields.description: Specify the API Token that you have generated on the InsiderSecurity instance.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Alerts by ID
operations.description: Get Alert details with respect to an Alert ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Alert ID You want to be fetched. This value can be retrieved from servicenow tickets, field ‘u_alert_id’.
parameters.description: Specify the Alert ID You want to be fetched. This value can be retrieved from servicenow tickets, field ‘u_alert_id’.

operations.title: Search Data Enrichment
operations.description: Search and Enrich Data on an underlying Elasticsearch instance.

parameters.name: index
parameters.title: Index
parameters.tooltip: Speicfy the Elasticsearch index to search in. Use ‘*’ forall, ‘raw’ for raw logs, ‘raw_meta.*.login’ for login, ‘raw_meta.netflow’ for network, and ‘raw_meta.*.file’ file access data entries.
parameters.description: Speicfy the Elasticsearch index to search in. Use ‘*’ forall, ‘raw’ for raw logs, ‘raw_meta.*.login’ for login, ‘raw_meta.netflow’ for network, and ‘raw_meta.*.file’ file access data entries.

parameters.name: entity_ip
parameters.title: Entity IP
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address of entity to search for.
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of entity to search for.

parameters.name: entity_name
parameters.title: Entity Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Hostname/sensor name of entity to search for.
parameters.description: Specify the Hostname/sensor name of entity to search for.

parameters.name: query
parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: Speicfy the query string to search for. Use this if you want a more generic search that searches across multiple fields and does substring matching.
parameters.description: Speicfy the query string to search for. Use this if you want a more generic search that searches across multiple fields and does substring matching.

parameters.name: time_start
parameters.title: Time Start
parameters.tooltip: Speicfy the Start time to search. Default to current time – 1 day. Time should be in epoch format.
parameters.description: Speicfy the Start time to search. Default to current time – 1 day. Time should be in epoch format.

parameters.name: time_end
parameters.title: Time End
parameters.tooltip: Specify the End time to search. Default to current time. Time should be in epoch format
parameters.description: Specify the End time to search. Default to current time. Time should be in epoch format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results to return per page. Defaults to 1000.
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page. Defaults to 1000.

operations.title: Search Alerts
operations.description: Searches and fetches the latest matching alert according to given Threat Name

parameters.name: risk_entity
parameters.title: Risk Entity
parameters.tooltip: Specify the entity which is at risk, It can be found in the ticket.
parameters.description: Specify the entity which is at risk, It can be found in the ticket.

parameters.name: threat_name
parameters.title: Threat Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name of threat to look up and fetch.
parameters.description: Specify the Name of threat to look up and fetch.

parameters.name: time_end
parameters.title: Time End
parameters.tooltip: Specify the End time to search from. Time should be in epoch format.
parameters.description: Specify the End time to search from. Time should be in epoch format.
